response.overview: The hilarious and disgruntled stand-up returns to Edinburgh with a fantastic new show. 'This guy is an exciting talent ... he is one of the best' (Scotsman). 'Raw and different' ***** (ThreeWeeks). 'The stand-out stand-up' (Evening Standard). 'An interesting and skilful stand-up, with some routines of brilliance' (Chortle.co.uk). 'Beautifully cynical ... and he is not far off being utterly brilliant' (Edinburgh Festivals Magazine). As seen on London Live's Funny Rotten Scoundrels.
response.title: Sean McLoughlin: I Will Prevail
